column4: i have added another drive to the system but i cant find the new drive

nope i just added another drives to the system
fdisk -l ?

its a server

and so on
if you type "dmsg" it will display lot of infos including lines about hardware (disk) detection
and something about GTK
i have hot added the drive
it is a server
server
how?
maybe you'll find info about the drives that were discovered at boot time with dmes

so there is no info about it in dmesg
dmesg|grep sd
